verses.verse: These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> besides the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> You have seen all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and to all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and to all his <S%H776>land;<s%>
the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>trials<s%> which your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> the <S%H226>signs,<s%> and those <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4159>wonders:<s%>

but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know,<s%> and <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

I have <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> your <S%H8008>clothes<s%> have not grown <S%H1086>old<s%> on <S%H5275>you,<s%> and your shoes have not grown <S%H1086>old<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

You have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> neither have you <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

When you <S%H935>came<s%> to this <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and we struck <S%H5221>them:<s%>

and we <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4520>Manassites.<s%>
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> therefore the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7919>them,<s%> that you may prosper in all that you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

You <S%H5324>stand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> all of you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> your <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> even all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> who is <S%H7130>in<s%> the midst of your <S%H4264>camps,<s%> from the one who <S%H2404>cuts<s%> your <S%H6086>wood<s%> to the one who <S%H7579>draws<s%> your <S%H4325>water;<s%>

that you may <S%H5674>enter<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and into his <S%H423>oath,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>makes<s%> with you this <S%H3117>day;<s%>

that he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> to himself for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and that he may be to you a <S%H430>God,<s%> as he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7650>you,<s%> and as he swore to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Neither with you only do I <S%H3772>make<s%> this <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and this <S%H423>oath,<s%>

but with him who <S%H5975>stands<s%> here with us <S%H3426>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and also with him who is not here with us this <S%H3117>day<s%>

(for you <S%H3045>know<s%> how we <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and how we <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> through which you <S%H7130>passed;<s%>

and you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations,<s%> and their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which were among them);

lest there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you <S%H376>man,<s%> or <S%H802>woman,<s%> or <S%H4940>family,<s%> or <S%H7626>tribe,<s%> whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> turns <S%H6437>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of those <S%H1471>nations;<s%> lest there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you a <S%H8328>root<s%> that <S%H6509>bears<s%> <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H3939>wormwood;<s%>

and it <S%H8085>happen,<s%> when he hears the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H423>curse,<s%> that he <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I shall have <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> the <S%H7302>moist<s%> with the <S%H6771>dry.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H5545>pardon<s%> <S%H639>him,<s%> but then the anger of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and his <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> will <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and all the <S%H423>curse<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> on <S%H3068>him,<s%> and Yahweh will blot <S%H4229>out<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> from under the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will set him <S%H914>apart<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to all the <S%H423>curses<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

The <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come,<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> who shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5237>you,<s%> and the foreigner who shall <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of that <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H8463>sicknesses<s%> with which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has made it <S%H2470>sick;<s%>

and that the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of it is <S%H1614>sulfur,<s%> <S%H4417>salt,<s%> and <S%H8316>burning,<s%> that it is not <S%H2232>sown,<s%> nor <S%H6779>bears,<s%> nor any <S%H6212>grass<s%> <S%H5927>grows<s%> <S%H4114>therein,<s%> like the overthrow of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H126>Admah<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> in his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in his <S%H2534>wrath:<s%>

even all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> "Why has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus to this <S%H776>land?<s%> What does the <S%H2750>heat<s%> of this <S%H1419>great<s%> anger <S%H639>mean?<s%>"

Then men shall <S%H559>say,<s%> "Because they forsook the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them when he brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H430>them,<s%> gods that they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know, and that he had not given to <S%H2505>them:<s%>

therefore the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against this <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> on it all the <S%H7045>curse<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5428>rooted<s%> them out of their <S%H127>land<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

The <S%H5641>secret<s%> things belong to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> but the things that are <S%H1540>revealed<s%> belong to us and to our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> that we may <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law.<s%>
